roleset.name: put something somewhere, again
roleset.note: REDEPOSIT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: redeposit-v
example.text: [The metals , originally scattered in trace amounts in magma or surrounding solid rocks ,]-1 become concentrated by circulating hot fluids and can be redeposited *-1 , under favorable temperature and pressure conditions , to form rich mineral veins .
example.arg: under favorable temperature and pressure conditions
